name: cmml-market-scan
description: CMML Market Scan project with React frontend and Node.js backend

scripts.build: cd web-react && npm install && npm install vite@4.3.9 @vitejs/plugin-react@4.2.0 tailwindcss autoprefixer postcss --no-save && npm run build
scripts.vercel-build: cd web-react && npm install && npm install vite@4.3.9 @vitejs/plugin-react@4.2.0 tailwindcss autoprefixer postcss --no-save && cd node_modules/tailwindcss && npm install && cd ../../ && node node_modules/vite/bin/vite.js build
